title: Craftis Multi-Pack of Bulk Crayons - 200 Boxes with 4 Colours Per Box, 800 Crayons Total - Crayon Set for Kids Perfect for Children's School, Restaurants, Party Bag Fillers and Travelling
features: BURSTING WITH COLOUR - Enjoy a rainbow of colours with 200 boxes of mixed coloured toddler crayons, perfect for sparking creativity in kids of all ages. Each box contains four vibrant crayon colours: Red, Yellow, Blue, Green, offering plenty of options for drawing, colouring, and crafting.

SAFE AND NON-TOXIC - Our crayons are made from high-quality materials, ensuring smooth and even colouring for every masterpiece. Each crayon is non-toxic, safety-tested to EU standards and pre-packed for easy contactless distribution.

GREAT VALUE, BIG FUN - With 200 boxes of crayons, you get exceptional value for your money. Perfect travel colouring set for kids, party bag fillers, play dates, wedding activity pack for children, and Christmas stocking fillers.

PERFECT FOR AGES 3+ – Each box is built to last, ensuring your crayons arrive in excellent condition and ready to use. Specially crafted for small hands, these vibrant crayons are easy to grip, making colouring fun and effortless for little artists. A fantastic addition to parties, classrooms, party bag fillers, and more!

CLASSROOM ESSENTIAL - Teachers and educators will appreciate the convenience of having 200 boxes of crayons on hand for art projects and colouring activities. From colouring books to DIY crafts, these crayons open a world of imaginative possibilities for kids.
